title: Tender for Supply of Meropenem Injection 1G 330,000 vials
decision_details:
- the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender to the lowest responsive bidder as follows, was approved by the Cabinet:
(i)   	10% of the quantity at a total cost of US $98,505.00 (LKR 12,962,135.01) in thfirst instance; and

(ii)   	the balance 90% of the quantity thereafter, at a total cost of US $886,545.00 (LKR 116,659,215.09).
